entry.summary:
Author: The_green_fairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,458Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 145

Summary: When fem!Merlin is injured during a bandit attack, Arthur discovers his servant's most dangerous secret—she's a woman. But that revelation pales in comparison to what comes next: Merlin has magic. Now Arthur must navigate his growing feelings while protecting the woman who has been risking everything to save his life, all while keeping her secrets from his father's deadly judgment.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 218,746Chapters: 48/100Kudos: 2,258

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: What Is Written
entry.summary:
Author: Bookbitch3457

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,240Chapters: 13/13Kudos: 45

Summary: Magic is free, Arthur is king, and Albion is whole, but something’s off about Merlin. Something in him is unraveling, twisted by a devotion to Arthur that’s beginning to ruin him. The court sees madness; Arthur sees the man who made him believe in destiny—in himself, the man he’s come to trust, to rely on, perhaps even love. And though Merlin grows harder to reach each day, Arthur still holds on—because he’s starting to realize he can’t bear to lose him. And he’s willing to do anything to save him.

entry.title: Fading Light
entry.summary:
Author: The_green_fairy

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,357Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Arthur is captured while scouting Cenred's territory and thrown into a dungeon cell. He's not alone—his cellmate is Merlin, a mysterious prisoner who somehow recognizes Arthur as royalty despite his disguise, and who tries to keep spirits light even as he's dragged away daily by guards. Arthur quickly realizes something is terribly wrong. Merlin is dying, slowly drained by strange manacles and Cenred's hunger for magic. Over days and weeks, Arthur watches helplessly as the cycle repeats: recovery, torture, deterioration. He falls for the strange, brilliant boy who jokes through agony and shields Arthur from darkness.

entry.title: i know better than to call you mine
entry.summary:
Author: yogurtnept

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,378Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 17

Summary: "I just feel lonely sometimes. Being a king is a lonely job. I can't trust anyone, or I can't meet someone in the way other people do. Everyone wants a piece of my kingdom, while the only thing i want is to love and be loved." He said, feeling dizzy with emotions and alcohol. It made him weak. I should stop drinking, he thought to himself. Not tonight though. He was allowed to drink and pity himself as much as he wanted tonight. Tomorrow, he will be the strong King of Camelot again, the man his people respect and trust. or Arthur is having emotions and doesn't know how to deal with it, so he does the most reasonable thing: getting drunk.

entry.title: Destiny’s Babysitter
entry.summary:
Author: NeutralMime

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,654Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 48

Summary: Everyone thought the prophecy about Camelot’s Golden Age was grand and glorious."One day, a fair and just king will bring Camelot into its Golden Age… if they reach it."Uther assumed it was him, with magic eradicated from the land.Nimueh thought she was destined to guide him as court sorcerer.Morgana was under the belief that it was her right.The druids whispered that Emrys, the greatest sorcerer of all time, would be the key.They were all wrong.The prophecy wasn’t about glory, conquest, or restoring magic.It was about keeping Arthur Pendragon alive long enough to actually be king.Which meant Emrys’ true, legendary destiny was not to wield unimaginable power or unite Albion— but to be the world’s most powerful, put-upon babysitter.

entry.title: Love beats fate
entry.summary:
Author: theo1932

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,277Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 44

Summary: In a kingdom where magic is hated and forbidden by the king, there is one thing that even he cannot stop with all his might. Soul marks are magical bonds that unite two souls meant for each other. Soul marks also help you feel what your soulmate feels, but only if they keep the connection open, otherwise the most you can feel are just tingles or a shadow of what they really feel. They are imprinted on the skin and come in different forms from one person to another. They are meant to be identical only to their exact copy. Usually the soul mark is in the same place on both people, but there are a few exceptions that no ordinary person knows about. These exceptions are rare and there are only a handful of such bonds in 100 years. When a being of magic is bound to a soul that has no affinity for magic, the soul marks are in different places because even if fate has bound them, even she does not know what can happen between two souls so different. Usually the chance of them meeting is almost impossible, but when destiny has a say, even the impossible disappears.

entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 144,307Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 116

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. entry.title: we have not touched the sea
entry.summary:
Author: gigiLemon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,850Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: Ser Leon nods, grip tightening on his sword ready to strike. “That’s the last siren.” “No, that's Merlin,” Arthur scoffs. Gwaine smirks, half confused, half amused as he says “Merlin?” So he is put under the spell. The spell of the siren who shows him something he cannot deny, something that his heart yearns for. Someone. Merlin. “Did you just say Merlin?” Elyan raises an eyebrow and all his knights are now staring blatantly right at him. Eyes honed in on his lips. And he has accidentally revealed it all to his knights. -OR-Arthur gets a little traumatized and Merlin comforts.
